title: user registration with valid email and password
description: Test the user registration endpoint to ensure it accepts valid email and password inputs, enforces password security compliance, and creates a new user account successfully.

title: email verification before full access
description: Verify that the email verification process is mandatory before granting full access to the system, ensuring unverified users cannot access protected resources.

title: oauth login account linking
description: Test OAuth login flows (e.g., Google OAuth) to confirm that OAuth logins properly link to existing user accounts and handle new account creation if necessary.

title: session token validation and auto refresh
description: Validate that session tokens are correctly validated on each request, support auto-refresh mechanisms, and that logout properly cleans up sessions.

title: free tier icp creation limit enforcement
description: Ensure that users on the Free subscription tier are limited to creating a maximum of 3 Ideal Customer Profiles (ICPs), and that attempts to exceed this limit are rejected.

title: payment failure handling and retry
description: Test the payment processing endpoint to verify that payment failures are handled gracefully with retry mechanisms and that subscription changes take effect immediately upon successful payment.

title: csrf token validation and rate limiting
description: Verify that all authentication endpoints enforce CSRF token validation and implement rate limiting to prevent brute-force attacks.

title: session persistence and multi tab synchronization
description: Test that user sessions persist across devices and browser tabs, and that session state is synchronized correctly across multiple tabs.

title: role based access control enforcement
description: Verify that role-based access control is enforced correctly for admin, standard, and enterprise user roles, restricting access to features and admin dashboard accordingly.

title: secure password hashing and https enforcement
description: Ensure that all authentication endpoints use HTTPS and that passwords are securely hashed using bcrypt or equivalent algorithms.
